Changing the activity timeout could be a quick workaround for this issue (see bug 628854 comment 3)

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open url (it's a testcase from bug 628854)
2. Move mouse in and out from content window
3. Wait till the end of transition

Actual Results:  
Text look slightly different right after scale transition end and 1 second later


Expected Results:  
Text should look the same after scale transition end and 1 second later


It happens when hardware acceleration is enabled, I don't have now access to computer with HA, I will provide screenshots showing the problem later

Also another testcase from bug 628854 should work (I'm not able to check now): https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/attachment.cgi?id=506975
